title: Sum of Tetranacci numbers
text:
The sequence of Tetranacci numbers is defined as follows:an= an-1+ an-2+ an-3+ an-4with   a0= a1= a2= 0 and a3= 1.InputInput starts with a positive integer t ≤ 4000, then t lines follow.  Each of the t lines contains two space separated integers m and n with 0 ≤ m ≤ n ≤ 109.OutputCalculate am+ am+1+ ... + anand print the result modulo 1000000007.ExampleInput:2
1 2
1919 5393Output:0
66616Note: If your solution times out, you may try thetutorial versionfirst.
